title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (The Royal Institute of the 
Architects of Ireland and the Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland) 
(Designation) Order 2025. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) (the royal institute architect ireland society chartered surveyor ireland) (designation) order 2025 definition

title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order— 

“Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland” means the registration body for 
Architects under Part 3 of the Building Control Act 2007; 

“Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland” means the registration body for 
Quantity Surveyors and Building Surveyors under Parts 4 and 5 respectively of 
the Building Control Act 2007. 

Designation
text_norm: 2 order-- royal institute architect ireland mean registration body architect part 3 building control act 2007 society chartered surveyor ireland mean registration body quantity surveyor building surveyor part 4 5 respectively building control act 2007 designation

title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: 3. The following are designated for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil
text_raw:
3. The following are designated for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil 
Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020) 
and may hold hearings before them, under the Building Control Act 2007 (No. 
21 of 2007), by remote means: 

(a) 

the Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland; 

(b) 

the Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [443] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [443]

title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order allows the Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland and the Society 
of Chartered Surveyors Ireland to conduct hearings, under the Building Control 
Act 2007, remotely as necessary. 

 
 
 
 
 [443] 5
